mapper.select: select email_subs from subs where email='eyesonme@naver.com'
select title,idx from trailer_view where idx like '%MS%'
select title,idx from trailer_view where idx like '%MC%'
select title,idx from trailer_view where idx like '%MA%'
select title,idx from trailer_view where idx like '%MH%'
select title,idx from trailer_view where idx like '%MR%'
select*from(select title,idx from trailer_view where idx like '%M%') where ROWNUM <= 50
select title,idx from trailer_view where idx like '%D%'
select title,idx from trailer_view where click is not null order by click desc
select title,idx from trailer_view where good is not null order by good desc
select*from(select title,idx from trailer_view order by dbms_random.random) where ROWNUM <= 20
select t.title,t.idx from trailer_view t, zzim_trailer z where t.idx=z.idx
select t.title,t.idx from trailer_view t, history h where t.idx=h.idx
